message: Dear Rahul, please find the syllabus for Advanced Machine Learning attached. I expect full attendance this semester.
Thank you, Sir. I have received the document and will be present for the introductory lecture at 11 AM.
Rahul, the department is looking for a lead for the Robotics Lab. Given your GPA, I have recommended your name.
I am honored, Sir. I will come to your office tomorrow to discuss the responsibilities.
Where are you? We were supposed to meet at 8:30 AM.
Extremely sorry, Sir. There was a medical emergency at home. Can we reschedule for 4 PM?
Very well. 4 PM sharp. Do not be late.
Rahul, your draft for the Neural Networks paper is missing the bibliography. Please resubmit by Monday.
Resubmitted, Sir. Apologies for the oversight. I was caught up with the group project.
I noticed you were not in the lab today. Is everything alright?
Yes Sir. Just a slight fever. I am working from my room today.
The TechCorp internship application portal is closing in 48 hours. I haven't seen your final application for review yet.
Sir, I am finishing the SOP now. I will send it for your signature by tomorrow morning.
Rahul, I received a call from your father. He seemed concerned about your project progress. What is happening?
Sir, there is no need for concern. I am just refining the data models. I will present a demo on Monday.
Your demo was underwhelming. The logic is flawed. You need to put in more hours in the lab.
I understand, Sir. I will put in extra hours this weekend.
Reminder: The mandatory seminar is tomorrow. Attendance is 10% of your grade.
You are missing the seminar, Rahul. This is unacceptable.
Sir, I am so sorry. I had a flat tire on the way. I am heading to the department now.
URGENT: Regarding your internship. TechCorp has flagged your late submission. You need to explain this to the Dean.
Sir, please allow me one chance to explain. I am under significant personal stress.
I am disappointed. You missed the Monday morning review. I am notifying your parents that your lead position is being revoked.
Sir, please! I've had a rough few weeks. I will be in the lab all day today.
Formal Warning: Your attendance has dropped below 60%. Failure to improve will lead to a semester back.
